_header: In the day of Saint Swithin
Note:
Cf. Wright and Halliwell-Phillipps (1845)
XThomas Wright, and James Orchard Halliwell-Phillipps. Reliquiae Antiquae. 2 vols. London: Smith, 1845, 1.93.
_description: A quatrain (abab) translating ‘Si pluat in festo processi S. Martiniari’ etc. which follows

CamEmm27.Transcription:
In þe daye of seynte SvythoneVane ginneþ riniggefforti
                    dawes mid ywonellestez such tiþinge
CamEmm27.Editions:
Robbins,  Rossell Hope. 
             “English Almanacks of the XVth Century.” 
             Philological Quarterly
         18 (1939): 321-31: 322.
